column1: Hydroxychloroquine 'most effective' coronavirus treatment: An international poll of 6,227 doctors surveyed in 30 countries, rated the anti-malaria drug hydroxychloroquine the best treatment for the novel coronavirus. FDA Approved. In use since 1955

National Institutes of Health Begins Clinical trial of hydroxychloroquine for coronavirus patients Hydroxychloroquine is used to treat malaria & rheumatoid conditions such as arthritis. The drug has demonstrated antiviral activity.

Hydroxychloroquine 'most effective' coronavirus treatment: An international poll of 6,227 doctors surveyed in 30 countries, rated the anti-malaria drug hydroxychloroquine the best treatment for the novel coronavirus. FDA Approved. In use since 1955
